S001.name: A Worthy Skull
S001.colourText: \u2018He killed well. He died well. Khorne shall savour this offering.\u2019 - Garrek Gorebeard
S001.rulesText: Score this in an end phase if your warband took an enemy leader out of action in the preceding action phase.

S002.name: Blood for the Blood God!
S002.colourText: Bloodreavers do not care for subtle strategy. Theirs is the brutal force of an overwhelming charge.
S002.rulesText: Score this immediately if three or more of your fighters made a Charge action in this phase.

S003.name: Coward!
S003.colourText: To retreat is weakness, and the weak must be culled.
S003.rulesText: Score this immediately if an enemy fighter begins a Move action adjacent to one of your fighters and ends it adjacent to none of your fighters.

S004.name: Draw the Gaze of Khorne
S004.colourText: The Blood God marks well the names of those who commit great acts of slaughter in his name.
S004.rulesText: Score this immediately if your warband takes two or more enemy fighters out of action in this phase.

S005.name: It Begins
S005.colourText: \u2018The first kill is the greatest. That first arc of hot blood through the air. The first scream of agony as your axe sinks home.\u2019 - Blooded Saek
S005.rulesText: Score this in an end phase if at least one fighter from each warband is out of action.

S006.name: Khorne Cares Not
S006.colourText: Khorne cares not from whence the blood flows.
S006.rulesText: Score this in an end phase if five or more fighters are out of action.

S007.name: Khorne\u2019s Champion
S007.colourText: The weak fall, and only the mighty are left standing. Such is the will of Khorne.
S007.rulesText: Score this in the third end phase if all fighters except one of your fighters are out of action.

S008.name: Let the Blood Flow
S008.colourText: All must wet their blade with the blood of the foe. To fail in this task is to invite the Blood God\u2019s wrath.
S008.rulesText: Score this immediately if three or more of your fighters made a successful Attack action in this phase.

S009.name: There is Only Slaughter
S009.colourText: \u2018What care we for worthless trinkets? Slaughter is all that matters.\u2019 - Garrek Gorebeard
S009.rulesText: Score this in an end phase if no fighter is holding an objective.

S010.name: Blood Offering
S010.colourText: \u2018Witness my offering, Lord of Skulls, and send me worthy foes to butcher.\u2019
S010.rulesText: Choose a friendly fighter. They suffer 1 damage. Roll two extra attack dice for their first Attack action in the next activation.
